description:
George recently turned 21 and he's taking full advantage of his legal drinking status.
"I pretty much drink every day," he said. "Not alone though, usually with friends."
He was going to college but decided to take a break to enjoy beer, girls, and the beach.
When asked about his taste in women, he replied, "I like a lot of different stuff. Usually not white girls, though. Usually they have to have some kind of flavor."
George is planning on returning to his studies in the fall and resuming his "participation" in the fraternity there.
title: George
